title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: Greetings my follow Nigeria (Naija) bitcoiners, i will like to celebrate everyone in this house for the good work we are doing in this Nigeria (Naija) local board, and there is an improvement in the area of quality post that made Nigeria local board to be part among the best local board in the Bitcointalk forum. Â The reason why I created this topic is to remind whoever that is in charge to allow Nigeria (Naija) local board to have moderator in the local board, I believe we are due for it and we have what it takes to have moderator so that we can begin to enjoy the respect and value all those local board that has moderators are enjoying in the Bitcointalk forum. If you check round other local board you will no that our facilitators in the Nigeria local board are doing a great job to impacted users about BTC that will generate potential bitcoiners in the future. Do we really need a moderator in this Nigeria local board? Or we don't have the requirements that qualify us to have moderator in the Nigeria local board forum? What is your opinion.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: You don tok am finish nah and we no need to get reasons or opinion about it for we to get a local board moderator wey actually from Naija. If you look around we have any qualified candidacies for the role so it's not a matter of lacking qualified individuals or there are no willing persons for the role. Having a local moderator will add more to the sense of belonging we dey enjoy for the forum and bcos as nah person wey dey closer and understand the Naija pidgin language beta e go dey easy for the moderator to identify between posts that is worth having a space in the LB or not. So issue of us having a LB moderator is not a matta of opinion but a necessity.
